column5: Hey OFC, I have started the search for a used atv and been searching the web to try and find out the steps to transfer ownership and get the plates in my name. Anyone gone through this recently. Not sure if the plate stays with the atv or if the plate stays with the owner

I just bought one in September. It's pretty much like buying a used car (minus the e-test. LOL) The plate stays with the seller. He has to do the normal bill of sale and sign over the ownership to you. You just take all the appropriate paperwork to the MTO, pay for a new plate and taxes. Pretty painless I thought.  Colin
